backend/main.mo: Defines the main actor with storage, access control, business profiles including banking details, and CRUD structures for customers, items, and invoices along with GST filing types.
backend/migration.mo: Contains migration logic and old/new data structure definitions to upgrade BusinessProfile to include banking details and preserve user, invoice, and item data.
feature_evidence.json: Lists feature evidence for banking details UI updates in settings and invoice views, including associated files, components, and test IDs.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Provides prewritten summaries for multiple frontend components, pages, utilities, and PWA files used across the application.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind-based global styling file defining OKLCH color variables, dark mode values, and base UI styling rules.
frontend/index.html: Main HTML entry configuring PWA metadata, icons, and iOS splash screens for GST Pro.
frontend/public/manifest.webmanifest: PWA manifest defining app metadata, icons, theme colors, and launch settings.
frontend/public/sw.js: Service worker implementing caching, offline support, and cache-first/network-first strategies for assets and navigation.
frontend/SMOKE_TEST.md: Manual smoke test checklist describing key authentication, admin panel, and user management flows to verify after deployment.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Root React component setting up routing, theming, query client config, and service worker registration.
frontend/src/components/admin/AddUserDia: Dialog for admins to create users with credentials, roles, and optional access expiry.
frontend/src/components/admin/AdminCrede: Admin login form using direct credentials instead of Internet Identity.
frontend/src/components/admin/AdminOnlyG: Protects admin pages by showing loading, access denied, or authorized content.
frontend/src/components/admin/AdminPorta: Layout wrapper for admin pages with title and optional back button.
frontend/src/components/admin/SetAccessU: Dialog for admins to set or clear a user's access‑until expiry timestamp.
frontend/src/components/admin/UsersTable: Displays a full admin user list with role badges, access controls, deletion, and navigation to user dashboards.
frontend/src/components/AppAccessGate.ts: No-op wrapper component that simply renders children, replacing prior access gating.
frontend/src/components/AppAccessLoginFo: Deprecated login form kept for compatibility, instructing users to use Internet Identity instead.
frontend/src/components/AppErrorBoundary: Error boundary capturing React errors and displaying a fallback screen.
frontend/src/components/AppShell.tsx: Layout shell providing header navigation, footer, and container structure around page content.
frontend/src/components/auth/CredentialS: Provides an email/password sign‑in form with validation, error display, and mutation‑based authentication.
frontend/src/components/auth/SignUpDialo: Implements a modal sign‑up flow with validation, success messaging, and account creation via mutation.
frontend/src/components/AuthGate.tsx: Authentication wrapper handling Internet Identity login, credential login UI, and loading states.
frontend/src/components/customers/Custom: Dialog for adding or editing customers with form validation and mutation‑based save operations.
Renders a customers table with edit/delete actions, loading and empty states, and delete confirmation.
frontend/src/components/ErrorFallbackScr: UI screen shown on fatal errors with reload and optional sign‑in actions.
frontend/src/components/FirstAdminSetupD: Empty placeholder file for first‑admin setup dialog.
frontend/src/components/forms/Scrollable: Scrollable wrapper for SelectContent ensuring consistent overflow behavior across devices.
frontend/src/components/gst/GstProfileSe: Displays GST profile details with badges, conditional rows, and fallback messaging.
frontend/src/components/invoices/Invoice: Provides a table-based editor for invoice line items with add, remove, and update functionality.
Renders a status badge for an invoice based on its current status.
frontend/src/components/invoices/Monthly: Generates and displays monthly invoice totals with filtering by month and year.
frontend/src/components/items/ItemFormDi: Dialog form for creating or editing an item with validation and API mutation hooks.
frontend/src/components/items/ItemsTable: Shows items in a responsive table with edit and delete actions and empty/loading states.
frontend/src/components/LoginButton.tsx: Provides a sign-in/sign-out button handling Internet Identity auth, logout cleanup, and loading states.
frontend/src/components/MobileNav.tsx: Responsive mobile navigation drawer with links and an external E‑Way Bill shortcut.
frontend/src/components/PrintLayout.tsx: Minimal authenticated layout for print views, including profile setup enforcement.
frontend/src/components/ProfileSetupDial: Prompts new users for their name and saves the profile before allowing app use.
frontend/src/components/pwa/IosInstallHe: Dialog explaining steps to install the PWA on iOS home screen.
frontend/src/components/pwa/PwaInstallFo: Renders install buttons for Android and iOS using the PWA install hook and shows confirmation or help dialogs.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and caches a backend actor tied to Internet Identity, refreshing dependent queries when identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useAdminCredentialSig: Provides a mutation to authenticate admin credentials through the backend and refresh admin-related queries.
frontend/src/hooks/useAdminUserDashboard: Fetches admin-only user invoice KPIs and retrieves user details from the cached users list.
frontend/src/hooks/useAdminUsers.ts: Admin hooks for listing, creating, deleting users and updating access expiry, all backed by the actor.
frontend/src/hooks/useCredentialSignIn.t: Handles normal user sign-in by ensuring II login, acquiring an authenticated actor, and validating credentials.
frontend/src/hooks/useCurrentUserProfile: Fetches and saves the caller's user profile using the authenticated actor with query invalidation.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides Internet Identity context, handling login, stored identity loading, and state for authentication flow.
frontend/src/hooks/useIsAdmin.ts: Queries the backend to check if the current user is an admin with appropriate loading and caching.
frontend/src/hooks/usePrintOnce.ts: Triggers window.print once when data is ready and optionally runs a callback after printing.
frontend/src/hooks/usePwaInstall.ts: Tracks PWA installability, handles beforeinstallprompt events, and exposes a method to trigger installation.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Defines React Query hooks for fetching and mutating user profiles, business profiles, customers, and related entities through the actor API.
frontend/src/hooks/useRecordInternetIden: Provides a helper hook to asynchronously record Internet Identity sign‑in events with retry logic and non-blocking error handling.
frontend/src/hooks/useSafeInternetIdenti: Adds a safe wrapper around Internet Identity login that clears stale sessions and retries login when needed.
frontend/src/hooks/useSignUp.ts: Implements a mutation hook for signing up users via the actor's signUp API call.
frontend/src/index.css: Contains Tailwind setup, theme variables, dark mode styles, mobile safe-area handling, touch optimizations, and print styles.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app, wrapping it with QueryClientProvider and InternetIdentityProvider.
frontend/src/pages/AdminPanelPage.tsx: Renders the admin panel, showing an admin login form when needed and the management interface for authorized admins.
frontend/src/pages/AdminUserDashboardPag: Displays an admin-only dashboard for a specific user, including user details, sign-in status, and invoice KPI metrics.
frontend/src/pages/CustomersPage.tsx: Shows a searchable customer list with add/edit functionality using dialogs and customer-related queries.
frontend/src/pages/DashboardPage.tsx: Renders the dashboard showing invoice KPIs, GST totals, and setup prompts, using various data queries and navigation actions.
frontend/src/pages/GstFilingStatusPage.t: Provides a GST filing status lookup with GSTIN search, FY selection, return type filters, and status table display.
frontend/src/pages/InvoiceDetailPage.tsx: Displays full invoice details with totals, customer info, and actions to finalize, cancel, delete, or print the invoice.
frontend/src/pages/InvoiceEditorPage.tsx: Handles creating and editing invoices, including line item editing, customer/item dialogs, and total calculation.
frontend/src/pages/InvoicePrintPage.tsx: Generates a printable invoice layout with business info, line items, totals, and auto-print trigger once data is loaded.
frontend/src/pages/InvoicesPage.tsx: Lists invoices with filters for status and date, displays summaries, and links to invoice actions. Uses queries for invoices, customers, items, and profile.
frontend/src/pages/ItemsPage.tsx: Displays and filters items with search, and provides dialogs for creating or editing items. Handles loading and error states.
frontend/src/pages/SettingsPage.tsx: Manages business profile settings including basic info, banking details, and logo upload. Loads existing data and submits updates with validation.
frontend/src/pwa/registerServiceWorker.t: Registers the service worker, checks for updates periodically, and logs update availability. Handles registration errors.
frontend/src/routeTree.tsx: Defines the full TanStack Router route tree, including app, print, and admin layouts and all page routes. Provides error and not-found handling.
frontend/src/utils/adminTimeFormat.ts: Formats bigint nanosecond timestamps into readable date/time or date-only strings. Includes conversion from Date to backend time.
frontend/src/utils/appAccessStorage.ts: Provides deprecated localStorage helpers for tracking per-principal app access. Includes functions to set, clear, and check stored access flags.
frontend/src/utils/dateFormat.ts: Utilities for formatting and parsing invoice dates and extracting year or month. Ensures safe fallbacks for invalid dates.
frontend/src/utils/financialYears.ts: Generates the last five Indian financial years based on current date. Uses April–March financial year rules.
frontend/src/utils/formatters.ts: Formats numbers as INR currency using Indian locale formatting.
frontend/src/utils/gstCalculations.ts: Computes invoice totals, discounts, GST components, and grand total, determining inter‑ vs intra‑state taxation. Includes a helper to calculate totals from an invoice object.
frontend/src/utils/gstFilingStatusDispla: Normalizes raw GST filing status strings into consistent labels and maps them to badge variants.
frontend/src/utils/indianStates.ts: Exports a constant list of all Indian states and union territories.
frontend/src/utils/invoiceNumbering.ts: Generates formatted invoice numbers using business profile settings and falls back to stored invoice numbers when present.
frontend/src/utils/invoiceRules.ts: Allows all invoices to be deleted and provides a generic deletion error message.
frontend/src/utils/passwordHash.ts: Empty placeholder file for password hashing utilities.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Provides helpers to read URL parameters, persist them in sessionStorage, and manage hash-based routing params.
frontend/src/utils/userFacingError.ts: Converts technical or backend error messages into user-friendly text with special handling for common cases.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures TailwindCSS theme, colors, animations, plugins, and content paths.
project_state.json: Defines project metadata, architecture notes, known issues, and existing features for GST Pro.
